: [EN]  Founded in 1998 and headquartered in Allen, Texas, Forte Payment Systems offers merchants a broad range of payment solutions, including credit card and debit card processing, ACH/eCheck origination, check verification and fraud prevention.Â  Through superior customer service and industry-leading technology, Forte is dedicated to helping organizations of all sizes grow and prosper by reducing transaction costs, mitigating risk, and increasing efficiencies.
